\begin{matlabcode}

% H = D*([1 0; 0 -1]^2 -2/3*[1 0; 0 1]) + g*(x*[0 1;1 0]+y*[0 -1i;1i 0]+z*[1 0;0 -1])
H = D*([1 0 0;0 0 0;0 0 -1]^2 ) + g*(x*[0 1 0;1 0 1;0 1 0]+y*[0 -1i 0;1i 0 -1i;0 1i 0]+z*[1 0 0;0 0 0;0 0 -1])
\end{matlabcode}
\begin{matlabsymbolicoutput}
H = 

\hskip1em $\displaystyle \left(\begin{array}{ccc}
\textrm{D}+g\,z & g\,{\left(x-y\,\mathrm{i}\right)} & 0\\
g\,{\left(x+y\,\mathrm{i}\right)} & 0 & g\,{\left(x-y\,\mathrm{i}\right)}\\
0 & g\,{\left(x+y\,\mathrm{i}\right)} & \textrm{D}-g\,z
\end{array}\right)$
\end{matlabsymbolicoutput}
\begin{matlabcode}

e = eig(H)
\end{matlabcode}
\begin{matlabsymbolicoutput}
e = 

\hskip1em $\displaystyle \begin{array}{l}
\left(\begin{array}{c}
\frac{2\,\textrm{D}}{3}+\frac{\sigma_2 }{\sigma_1 }+\sigma_1 \\
\frac{2\,\textrm{D}}{3}-\frac{\sigma_2 }{2\,\sigma_1 }-\frac{\sigma_1 }{2}-\frac{\sqrt{3}\,{\left(\frac{\sigma_2 }{\sigma_1 }-\sigma_1 \right)}\,\mathrm{i}}{2}\\
\frac{2\,\textrm{D}}{3}-\frac{\sigma_2 }{2\,\sigma_1 }-\frac{\sigma_1 }{2}+\frac{\sqrt{3}\,{\left(\frac{\sigma_2 }{\sigma_1 }-\sigma_1 \right)}\,\mathrm{i}}{2}
\end{array}\right)\\
\mathrm{}\\
\textrm{where}\\
\mathrm{}\\
\;\;\sigma_1 ={{\left(\sigma_3 +\sqrt{{{\left(\sigma_3 +\frac{8\,{\textrm{D}}^3 }{27}-\textrm{D}\,g^2 \,x^2 -\textrm{D}\,g^2 \,y^2 \right)}}^2 -{\sigma_2 }^3 }+\frac{8\,{\textrm{D}}^3 }{27}-\textrm{D}\,g^2 \,x^2 -\textrm{D}\,g^2 \,y^2 \right)}}^{1/3} \\
\mathrm{}\\
\;\;\sigma_2 =\frac{{\textrm{D}}^2 }{9}+\frac{2\,g^2 \,x^2 }{3}+\frac{2\,g^2 \,y^2 }{3}+\frac{g^2 \,z^2 }{3}\\
\mathrm{}\\
\;\;\sigma_3 =\frac{\textrm{D}\,{\left(-{\textrm{D}}^2 +2\,g^2 \,x^2 +2\,g^2 \,y^2 +g^2 \,z^2 \right)}}{3}
\end{array}$
\end{matlabsymbolicoutput}

-\frac{{\sigma_2 }^{2/3} -\sqrt{3}\,{\sigma_2 }^{2/3} \,\mathrm{i}+\sqrt{3}\,{\textrm{D}}^2 \,\mathrm{i}-4\,\textrm{D}\,{\sigma_2 }^{1/3} +{\textrm{D}}^2 +\sigma_5 +\sigma_4 +\sigma_6 +6\,\sqrt{3}\,g^2 \,x^2 \,\mathrm{i}+6\,\sqrt{3}\,g^2 \,y^2 \,\mathrm{i}+3\,\sqrt{3}\,g^2 \,z^2 \,\mathrm{i}}{6\,{\sigma_2 }^{1/3} }\\
\sigma_1 -\frac{\frac{{\textrm{D}}^2 }{6}+g^2 \,x^2 +g^2 \,y^2 +\frac{g^2 \,z^2 }{2}}{{\sigma_2 }^{1/3} }-\frac{{\sigma_2 }^{1/3} }{6}+\frac{\sqrt{3}\,{\left(-\frac{{\sigma_2 }^{2/3} \,\mathrm{i}}{6}+\frac{{\textrm{D}}^2 \,\mathrm{i}}{6}+g^2 \,x^2 \,\mathrm{i}+g^2 \,y^2 \,\mathrm{i}+\frac{g^2 \,z^2 \,\mathrm{i}}{2}\right)}}{{\sigma_2 }^{1/3} }
\end{array}\right)\\
\mathrm{}\\

\mathrm{}\\
\;\;\sigma_1 =\frac{2\,\textrm{D}}{3}\\
\mathrm{}\\
\;\;\sigma_2 =\sqrt{{\textrm{D}}^2 \,{{\left({\textrm{D}}^2 +9\,g^2 \,x^2 +9\,g^2 \,y^2 -9\,g^2 \,z^2 \right)}}^2 -{\sigma_3 }^3 }-{\textrm{D}}^3 -9\,\textrm{D}\,g^2 \,x^2 -9\,\textrm{D}\,g^2 \,y^2 +9\,\textrm{D}\,g^2 \,z^2 \\
\mathrm{}\\
\;\;\sigma_3 ={\textrm{D}}^2 +\sigma_5 +\sigma_4 +\sigma_6 \\
\mathrm{}\\
\;\;\sigma_4 =6\,g^2 \,y^2 \\
\mathrm{}\\
\;\;\sigma_5 =6\,g^2 \,x^2 \\
\mathrm{}\\
\;\;\sigma_6 =3\,g^2 \,z^2 
\end{array}$
